name: Ask CLI
description: Simple open-source CLI tool for getting command-line help and coding assistance directly from the terminal with fast answers without context switching. Supports multiple AI providers and local models.
community_quotes: A simple app designed to do one thing well: provide instant command assistance
This isn't a complex coding agent like Claude Code; it is built specifically to get short, fast answers without context switching
Works with popular hosted models (Gemini, Claude, ChatGPT) or with local models and external providers that support OpenAI-compatible APIs

name: relayd
description: Remote control for Codex agents that lets developers monitor and control AI coding agents from their phone with push notifications, one-tap continue functionality, and the ability to approve file changes and tool calls remotely.
community_quotes: Finally, I can grab a coffee without worrying that my AI agent is deleting files back at home
Can I hit a kill switch instantly from my phone if I see it going off the rails?
